title: Lucidia Persona Packet
description: Structured response envelope expected from Lucidia persona evaluations.

verdict.description: Plain-language recommendation rendered by the persona.

balanced_ternary.description: Balanced ternary vote where '+' affirms, '-' rejects, and '0' abstains or remains neutral.
balanced_ternary.title: PersonaPacket
balanced_ternary.description: Schema describing the response payload returned by a Lucidia persona.

persona.description: Human readable name of the persona that produced the packet.

summary.description: Short headline style summary capturing the persona response.

response.description: Full text generated by the persona.

confidence.description: Self-reported confidence for the verdict on a closed interval of [0, 1].

justification.description: Short rationale that backs the verdict and vote.

evidence.description: Optional citations or structured evidence supporting the justification.

confidence_notes.description: Optional explanation for the selected confidence value.
Persona self-assessed confidence in the response, normalised between 0 and 1.

score.description: Consensus ready score computed by the Lucidia Encompass aggregator.

tokens.description: Token level breakdown used by the viewer to colourise the persona response.

weight.description: Relative emphasis the persona placed on the token.

metadata.description: Additional persona supplied metadata (focus areas, provenance, etc.).

error.description: Optional error string when persona generation failed.
